# RSA2
> `-`

## About the Challenge
We were given a file that contain modulus, public exponent, and the ciphertext

```
n = 

e = 65537

c = 
```

## How to Solve?
In this case im using [X-RSA](https://github.com/X-Vector/X-RSA) to recover the plaintext, and then choose the first option
